member.name: IMFWorkQueueServices.BeginRegisterPlatformWorkQueueWithMMCSS
member.summary: Associates a platform work queue with a Multimedia Class Scheduler Service (MMCSS) task.
member.param: The platform work queue to register with MMCSS. See Work Queue Identifiers. To register all of the standard work queues to the same MMCSS task, set this parameter to MFASYNC_CALLBACK_QUEUE_ALL.
The name of the MMCSS task to be performed.
The unique task identifier. To obtain a new task identifier, set this value to zero.
A pointer to the interface of a callback object. The caller must implement this interface.

A pointer to the IUnknown interface of a state object, defined by the caller. This parameter can be NULL. You can use this object to hold state information. The object is returned to the caller when the callback is invoked.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFWorkQueueServices.BeginRegisterTopologyWorkQueuesWithMMCSS
member.summary: Registers the topology work queues with the Multimedia Class Scheduler Service (MMCSS).
member.param: A pointer to the interface of a callback object. The caller must implement this interface.

A pointer to the IUnknown interface of a state object defined by the caller. This parameter can be NULL. You can use this object to hold state information. The object is returned to the caller when the callback is invoked.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFWorkQueueServices.BeginUnregisterPlatformWorkQueueWithMMCSS
member.summary: Unregisters a platform work queue from a Multimedia Class Scheduler Service (MMCSS) task.
member.param: Platform work queue to register with MMCSS. See .
Pointer to the interface of a callback object. The caller must implement this interface.

Pointer to the IUnknown interface of a state object, defined by the caller. This parameter can be NULL. You can use this object to hold state information. The object is returned to the caller when the callback is invoked.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

member.name: IMFWorkQueueServices.BeginUnregisterTopologyWorkQueuesWithMMCSS
member.summary: Unregisters the topology work queues from the Multimedia Class Scheduler Service (MMCSS).
member.param: Pointer to the interface of a callback object. The caller must implement this interface.

Pointer to the IUnknown interface of a state object, defined by the caller. This parameter can be NULL. You can use this object to hold state information. The object is returned to the caller when the callback is invoked.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

member.name: IMFWorkQueueServices.EndRegisterPlatformWorkQueueWithMMCSS
member.summary: Completes an asynchronous request to associate a platform work queue with a Multimedia Class Scheduler Service (MMCSS) task.
member.param: Pointer to the interface. Pass in the same pointer that your callback object received in the method.
The unique task identifier.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

member.name: IMFWorkQueueServices.EndRegisterTopologyWorkQueuesWithMMCSS
member.summary: Completes an asynchronous request to register the topology work queues with the Multimedia Class Scheduler Service (MMCSS).
member.param: Pointer to the interface. Pass in the same pointer that your callback object received in the method.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

member.name: IMFWorkQueueServices.EndUnregisterPlatformWorkQueueWithMMCSS
member.summary: Completes an asynchronous request to unregister a platform work queue from a Multimedia Class Scheduler Service (MMCSS) task.
member.param: Pointer to the interface. Pass in the same pointer that your callback object received in the method.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

member.name: IMFWorkQueueServices.EndUnregisterTopologyWorkQueuesWithMMCSS
member.summary: Completes an asynchronous request to unregister the topology work queues from the Multimedia Class Scheduler Service (MMCSS).
member.param: Pointer to the interface. Pass in the same pointer that your callback object received in the method.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

member.name: IMFWorkQueueServices.GetPlaftormWorkQueueMMCSSClass
member.summary: Retrieves the Multimedia Class Scheduler Service (MMCSS) class for a specified platform work queue.
member.param: Platform work queue to query. See .
Pointer to a buffer that receives the name of the MMCSS class. This parameter can be NULL.
On input, specifies the size of the pwszClass buffer, in characters. On output, receives the required size of the buffer, in characters. The size includes the terminating null character.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

listheader.description: The pwszClass buffer is too small to receive the class name.

member.name: IMFWorkQueueServices.GetPlatformWorkQueueMMCSSTaskId
member.summary: Retrieves the Multimedia Class Scheduler Service (MMCSS) task identifier for a specified platform work queue.
member.param: Platform work queue to query. See .
Receives the task identifier.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

member.name: IMFWorkQueueServices.GetTopologyWorkQueueMMCSSClass
member.summary: Retrieves the Multimedia Class Scheduler Service (MMCSS) class for a specified branch of the current topology.
member.param: Identifies the work queue assigned to this topology branch. The application defines this value by setting the MF_TOPONODE_WORKQUEUE_ID attribute on the source node for the branch.
Pointer to a buffer that receives the name of the MMCSS class. This parameter can be NULL.
On input, specifies the size of the pwszClass buffer, in characters. On output, receives the required size of the buffer, in characters. The size includes the terminating null character.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

listheader.description: There is no work queue with the specified identifier.
The pwszClass buffer is too small to receive the class name.

member.name: IMFWorkQueueServices.GetTopologyWorkQueueMMCSSTaskId
member.summary: Retrieves the Multimedia Class Scheduler Service (MMCSS) task identifier for a specified branch of the current topology.
member.param: Identifies the work queue assigned to this topology branch. The application defines this value by setting the MF_TOPONODE_WORKQUEUE_ID attribute on the source node for the branch.
Receives the task identifier.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

summary.para: Controls the work queues created by the Media Session.
The Media Session exposes this interface as a service. To obtain a pointer to this interface, call on the Media Session with the service identifier MF_WORKQUEUE_SERVICES.
